channel.title: radio amateur on Fabrice Aneche
channel.description: Recent content in radio amateur on Fabrice Aneche

item.title: Got my amateur radio license KK6NXK
item.description: When I was a young child, I remember listening to an old radio receiver with my grandfather, looking for morse transmission. 30 years later, I take the opportunity to get my radio amateur license in the US, it was not difficult (Technicial license is easy), especially cause US radio amateurs are using the metric system (almost all the time …), the only difficulties were to learn some terms and simple formulas from french to english and to know some parts of regulation by heart (I have never been able to learn by heart).
